rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Brave citizens of New Los Angeles:
this is your director general, Maurice Chausson.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0002
rows.name: Today, I come before you with truly joyous news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0003
rows.name:
News that I have been longing to be able to share with you
since we first set foot on this unknown world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Thanks to the tireless efforts of the
brave men and women of BLADE,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0005
rows.name:
we have finally—finally—succeeded in
securing the location of the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Now, make no mistake:
recovery of the core will not be easy—[ST:page p1=90 ]especially as the Ganglion
continue their persecution of our people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0007
rows.name:
But as long as we forge ahead with the same
determination and fortitude that got us this far,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0008
rows.name:
I have every confidence we will succeed in our mission.
We will return to our natural bodies,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0009
rows.name:
and take our place as living, breathing residents
of our new home here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Until then, I ask you all to stand together
in strength and courage, as proud citizens of NLA.[ST:wait ]
